required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Open-label, Single-dose, Two-treatment, Randomized, Cross-over Study to Investigate the Effects of the SLCO2B1 c.1457C>T Polymorphism and Apple Juice on the Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Acebutolol in Healthy Korean and Japanese Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Single-dose, Two-treatment, Randomized, Cross-over Study to Investigate the Effects of the SLCO2B1 c.1457C>T Polymorphism and Apple Juice on the Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Acebutolol in Healthy Korean and Japanese Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: An open-label, single-dose, two-treatment, randomized, cross-over study to investigate the effects of the SLCO2B1 c.1457C>T polymorphism and apple juice on the pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of acebutolol in healthy Korean and Japanese volunteers

primary_outcome.measure: AUC of acebutolol according to the SLCO2B1 genotypes
primary_outcome.description: The area under the plasma concentration versus time curve, from time 0 to the last measurable concentration, as calculated by the linear/log trapezoidal method will be summarized by treatment and genotype group using descriptive statistics.

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood pressure of the subjects who administered acebutolol according to the SLCO2B1 genotypes
secondary_outcome.description: Blood pressure (systolic, diastolic) measurement will be presented as descriptive statistics for the difference from baseline where appropriate.

intervention.description: Placebo capsule(Capsules filled up with lactose)
intervention.other_name: Placebo capsule(Capsules filled up with lactose)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject is informed of the investigational nature of this study and voluntarily agrees to participate in this study and signs an Institutional Review Board (IRB) - approved informed consent prior to performing any of the screening procedures
Exclusion Criteria:
- A subject with history of allergies including study drug (acebutolol) or other drug allergies (aspirin, antibiotics, etc.), or history of clinically significant allergies

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Clinical Pharmacology and Therapeutics, Oita University Faculty of Medicine, Oita, Japan

facility.name: General Clinical Research Center, Oita University Hospital

responsible_party.investigator_title: Professor of Clinical Pharmacology and Therapeutics
